dmca.title: Google Asked to Remove Links to Story "Seduction" (#2)
dmca.body: To: Google, Inc. Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints [private] Mountain View, CA 94043 Under Sections 512(g)(2) and (3) of the DMCA, I hereby notify Google that my copyrighted work, entitled "Seduction," is being infringed, and I request removal of all infringing materials from Google's indexes and cache. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on the web pages of the infringing URLs listed below. All of these sites are infringing that work, as I have not authorized its publication. Here is a search query that returns all of the infringing pages: "Hearing the buzzer, I ran downstairs to let her in" (http://www.google.com/search?q=%22 Hearing+the+buzzer,+I+ran+downstairs+to+let+her+in%22 &num=100&hl=en&ie=ISO-8859-1&oe =ISO-8859-1&filter=0) The infringing URL that I am aware is the following: [REDACTED] This URL is cached by Google at: [REDACTED] My name, address, daytime telephone number, and email address are: [private] [private]; Cambridge, MA 02138 [private] [private] I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the infonnation in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. [private]
